update.description:
# Video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P_kBFYr7xZg

# Changes

* Remove Apply button

* New button behaviors:

    * `Reset`: Restores the dialog and corresponding 3D elements to the state they were when the dialog was opened.

    * `Cancel`: Resets and closes the dialog.

    * `Ok`: Reapply all changes and close the dialog.

* Fields in the inspectors which have visible effects on the rest of the model editor should take effect in real time:

    * Joint: name, parent, child, type, pose, axis

    * Link: pose

    * Visual: pose, geometry, transparency, colors, material

    * Collision: pose, geometry

* Fix issue #1472

* Partial fix for #1527

* Partial fix for #402

* Moved some gui/model tests outside of ENABLE_SCREEN_TESTS so they run on Jenkins, [successfully](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/425/)
update.title: Model Editor: Apply inspector changes in real time and add reset button

content.raw:
User opens Inspector. User adds visual or collision. User makes other changes. User presses Reset. Everything resets, including visual/collision. 

Is that the scenario we're determining?

content.raw:
[no gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/755/) happy

[gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/568/) happy

[homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/574/) happy

[coverage](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/427)

* `CollisionConfig`: [52%](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/427/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_gui_model/CollisionConfig_cc.html)
* `JointInspector`: [82%](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/427/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_gui_model/JointInspector_cc.html)
* `LinkConfig`: [63%](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/427/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_gui_model/LinkConfig_cc.html)
* `LinkInspector`: [50%](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/427/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_gui_model/LinkInspector_cc.html)
* `VisualConfig`: [52%](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/427/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_gui_model/VisualConfig_cc.html)
content.html:
no gpu happy

gpu happy

homebrew happy

coverage

  • CollisionConfig: 52%
  • JointInspector: 82%
  • LinkConfig: 63%
  • LinkInspector: 50%
  • VisualConfig: 52%
